ResourceHeader.Description: Ground-based vector magnetic field at Yellowknife, Canada, 1 s, Level-2 data, CANMON Network, Higher latitude chain (Lat 62.5, Long 245.5). Station Code: YKC.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: David Calp, The Canadian Magnetic Observatory Network (CANMON), maintained and operated by the Geological Survey of Canada, provided the data used in this study.

NumericalData.Keyword: CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Ionospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DATA_TYPE: MAG>Magnetic Field
CDF Global Attribute GENERATION_DATE: Sun Jan 15 07:00:48 2012
CDF Global Attribute GENERATED_BY: THEMIS SOC

CDF Global Attribute RULES_OF_USE: Geomagnetic data are provided for your use and are not for sale or distribution by you to third parties, without the express written permission of the Geological Survey of Canada (GSC). Any report or Publication that makes use of these data should acknowledge the Geological Survey of Canada as the source. One copy of each report or publication should be sent to the GSC. We ask that the data not be used for commercial purposes, nor in any project in which you, your organization, or your collaborators are in a commercial agreement with any third party. Commercial users may contact the Geological Survey of Canada.

Parameter.Name: B in XYZ Components
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_ykc_epoch
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field B in XYZ vector components

Parameter.Name: H component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_ykc_epoch
Parameter.Description: H component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_ykc.

Parameter.Name: D component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_ykc_epoch
Parameter.Description: D component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_ykc.

Parameter.Name: Z component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_ykc_epoch
Parameter.Description: Z component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_ykc.

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_ykc_time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_ykc_epoch

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_ykc_epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_THEMIS_EPOCH with the following input parameters: thg_mag_ykc_epoch0, thg_mag_ykc_time.
